Pierce is currently the Director of the Institute for Security and Public Policy and Principal Research Scientist for the College of Criminal Justice at Northeastern University. Dr. Pierce has conducted research on a broad range of social and economic issues and has obtained funding for his research from a variety of agencies including the NIJ, the National Institute of Mental Health, the ATF, the National Science Foundation, and the DHS.
